COMING SOON

Green Refill Shop is the first Zero Waste Shop in Merthyr Tydfil.
You can find us at 52, Glebeland Street

GREEN is -

  • An eco friendly refill / zero waste grocery shop
  • Will sell organic fruit and vegetables
  • Will offer a variety of good quality Welsh produce
  • Welsh coffee and daily pastries

Reduce your carbon footprint by refilling containers with dried produce and switching to more environmentally conscious products.

No unnecessary plastic packaging, no plastic lids, straws or carrier bags. The ethos of the Green Refill Shop is to Reduce, Reuse, Refill and Recycle.

A place to do your weekly shopping without all of the plastic waste.

Encouraging our community to be more mindful of our environment and the impact that we have on the planet.
